department: College of Computing and Digital Media
biography: Greg Acierto is an experienced Manager and Solution Architect at Accenture Technology.  As a leader in the Business & Systems Integration practice, he has over 10 years of solution architecture, project management and technical sales experience.  Greg has a Master of Science in Information Systems from DePaul University in Chicago and a Bachelor of Science in Psychology from the University of Illinois in Urbana-Champaign.
